sub_title: Is finance a solid businesspartner within your organization?
summary:
My expertise focuses on setting up, recalibrating or redesigning the finance function within an organization, ensuring that objectives are achieved on an operational, tactical and strategic level.

To achieve this, finance MUST be a solid business partner within the organization.
This goes much further than the 'basic' P&L and the Balance Sheet. Gaining insights into performance drivers, bridging between departments, having control over cash flows, having foresight, making analyzes and being able to prepare valuable reports are core activities of a successful finance function within an organization.

I am the designated sparring partner for management for ad interim assignments, for tactical and strategic issues or projects to get your finance organization back on track and gain structural confidence in the numbers, performance and forecast.

profile_positions.description:
The Finance function is important for (co-)determining the direction of the organization.
A reliable, hands-on finance function enables the organization to make important choices based on facts and essential insights, such as providing powerful dashboards, avoiding pitfalls and risks management. 
I believe that finance should also be a driving force in focusing on opportunities and is therefore an important and indispensable part for a successful organization.

AirborneFinance assists organizations to take their finance function to a higher level and protect it from stagnation, standstill or decline.

AirborneFinance, Elevating finance to new heights
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
IQEQ is a corporate service provider, providing high quality personalized investor services.
It’s core business is helping clients to stay compliant and act as a guardian and facilitate client’s investments. When I joined IQEQ (legacy SGG) in 2016, it’s presence was local and employed 500 employees, currently IQEQ is a top 5 player globally, servicing clients around the globe and employing >5.000 employees.

I was part of the operational leadership team reporting directly to the COO.
To support IQEQ growth strategy, there is a need to further integrate, upscale and align quality standards of the shared service centers. This was supported by initiating IQEQ’s biggest project so far (Project Horizon). Goal is a significant increase of resources in the shared service centers in a timeframe of 2 years, in the existing location in Manila and Mauritius and open a new center in India (Hyderabad) and supporting EBITDA by attracting talent at the right price. 

In my role as Finance & Operations Performance Director I am responsible for:
-	Coordinate local Finance teams in the Shared Service Centers
-	Building finance community for both business and financial accounting
-	Align with group reporting standards 
-	Improve control standards
-	Set-up and Standardize Recharge Model
profile_positions.title: Finance & Operations Performance Director
